name: Fly Master
description:
This is an endless videogame. Fly as high as possible with your jetpack. But be careful, it will overheat if you don't give it a break.

Movement: Joystick on the screen. Drag and keep pressed to move the character.

Platforms: There are different types of platforms where you can land.

  1. Just a normal platform: 
  2. Bouncy platform:
  3. One-sided platform. You will be able to pass through this platform from bellow.
